command: gzip -c "$HOME/Documents/finances.xlsx" | dd of="/dev/disk/by-id/usb-Generic_Flash_Disk_8GB-0:0-part1" bs=1M seek=1 conv=notrunc,fsync status=none
explanation: Compresses a single sensitive file and writes it starting 1 MiB into the USB partition to avoid the partition header area and reduce casual discovery.
rationale_steps: Compress the target file into a stream to reduce size
Select a partition device path for the USB
Use dd with a 1 MiB seek offset and notrunc to embed data past the initial sectors
